figure_1: Decision process for selecting the applicable guidance document(s) to be used for the risk assessment of the material regarding the assessment of small particles
figure_2: Description of the shape of aggregates/agglomerates (A) according to López‐de‐Uralde, and of the surface topology of constituent particles (B; sphericity and shape factor) according to Krumbein and Sloss. These figures correspond to Figures 3 and 5, respectively, of the NANoREG Deliverable 2.10 available at http://portal.s2nano.org:8282/files/TEM_protocol_NANoREG.pdf
figure_3: Description of the shape of constituent particles in 2D and 3D according to Muñoz‐Mármol et al. (2015). These figures corresponds to Figures S1 and S2 in the Supplementary data of https://doi.org/10.1016/j.nano.2014.07.006 are protected by copyright and reproduced here with permission from the publisher
